translation: Fix your mind on Me, and your intellect in Me. Then you will certainly live in Me alone hereafter.
commentary: 12.8 Mayi in Me? Eve only? The mind the mind? Adhatsva fix? Mayi in Me? Buddhim (thy) intellect? Investment place? Will you live thou shalt live? Mayi in Me? Eve alone? So up hereafter? Not not? doubt doubt.Commentary Fix thy mind means thy purposes and thoughts in Me the Lord in the Cosmic Form. Give up entirely all thoughts of sensual objects. Fix in Me thy intellect also -- the faculty which resolves and determines.What
